author: Mighty_Wanderer
title: Awesome set, but a little on the expensive side
review:
Like I stated, this set is pretty awesome, but a bit on the expensive side at $80 for 622 pieces. Although, in my opinion the difference is made up by Pythor and the 4 Ninja, this being Pythor's only appearance in Lego and the only set including the 4 main Ninja (excluding Lloyd).

Box/Instructions

The instructions and sticker sheet came packaged in their own bag with a piece of cardboard to keep them from bending. The box was pretty large, but fit the pieces perfectly, without a lot of sliding room, which was nice.

Parts

Great selection of parts, new and old. My favorite new parts are the 1x1 round plates, they've got a lot of potential.

Minifigures

Starting with Spitta, of the Venomari tribe: He is a pretty cool figure, I really like his torso, but not really his head. I don't think it looks very much like a snake.

Pythor, of the Anacondai tribe, is a very exclusive figure - appearing only in this set. I think Lego failed with this figure, mainly because his mouth is open, making him really hard to pose.

The four Ninja, of the human and nin-droid kind: I really like these new ZX Ninja, with their 4-sword backpieces, and great torso printing.

The build

Fairly fun build, but there are a couple spots of technic building which gets kind of tedious, and a younger building might need help. (I actually messed up in at a critical point, and it was quite hard to fix it because I didn't realize my mistake until awhile later).

The completed model

Fun model, the extending wings is a pretty cool function. I like how when the wings are not extended, the flying part of the vehicle locks on to the bottom part, but when they are extended, it unlocks and you can separate the two.

Summary

Great set, try to get in on sale if possible. If not, get it anyway. :-)

author: eggabbey
review:
howdy

Pros

  • Pro 1: Includes the exclusive minifig pythor
  • Pro 2: Includes all the ninja and their golden weapons and an extra fire sword and shuriken
  • Pro 3: The vehicle itself has cool features like...
  • 1. top can lift off and "fly"
  • 2. you can shoot golden missles (i turned the blades on them backwards and use them as grapple hooks)
  • 3. has snake cage which if you seperate pythor's torso and head from his tail you can fit in there
  • 4.has huge "music" cannons
  • 5. includes rubber chains which have spikes on them that are epic cool
  • Pro 4: includes 4 katanas for the ninja to use as backup weapons
  • Pro 5: has multiple rare pieces like pythors head
  • Pro 6: its hugewhen you build it (bigger than on the box)
  • Pro 7: has places to store all 4 golden weapons (look on the box to see where)
  • …

Cons

  • Con 1: its a little to big and the great devourer in epic dragon battle would be no match
  • Con 2: only has 2 snakes come with it so better get an enemy to deal with before you get this
  • Con 3: the cocpits on hold 1 ninja each so you have to seat the other two on the top
  • Con 4: the back tires prevent instant turning so having an action movie is hard
  • Con 5: the treads fall backwards (but not off) alot
  • Con 6: the stick that holds the golden missles falls off alot
  • …

if you buy this you might want to have a good enemy first

author: VBaskin2010
title: 2 Vehicles Are Better Than One By VBaskin2010
review:
When Pythor finally resurrected their queen, Great Devourer it is up to the NinjaGo Ninjas to combine their new true potential powers to create the legendary Tornado Of Creation.

 

The result? a solar power race car type of tank and a lunar power energy gilder type of fighter jet all rolled up into one, and they christened it the Ultra Sonic Raider A.K.A. the NinjaGo Ninjas' Ninja Tank.

 

This vehicle is one of a kind whether they are one or they can separate as the Ninja Tank and the Sonic Gilder Jet.

 

Together this vehicle just got what it takes to not only stop the Great Devourer but also Pythor too.

 

But can the Raider do it, well duh! you know it can!

author: Matroxide
title: Perfect Birthday Set!
review: I had just turned 16 and had gone through all the presents that were out, and I had no idea mom had one more set in her room! Of course when she had brought it out, I had to believe it was the Ultra Sonic Raider! This was the first set I opened, I was so excited! The Minifigures Zane ZX, Jay ZX, Kai ZX, Cole ZX, Spitta, and Pythor were the perfect ones to put in! The set itself is realy awsome! First it has the seperation function to take the top part off of the bottom! Also the top half comes with a prison cell to put Spitta in. Another function is the flick-fire missiles that are mounted on the treds! I tried realy hard to get the stickers to look perfect and now it looks amazing! Because the instructions were so clear, the build was easy, and I think even younger kids would have fun with this set! Plus as a nice bonus the set comes with two silver and two black Katanas and all four of the Golden Weapons of Spinjitzu with an extra Dragon Sword of Fire!

author: A
title: Explanations of what I think of the Ultra Sonic Raider.
review: Hi. I'm going to start with the pricing, which is perfectly fine. I would actually raise the price to $90! The packaging i'm gonna give a 4 cause it's so BIG! I really think that they could of made the box smaller. Alright the parts. So really think they could of put some more technic lift arms in there to make another special function. Now were on to building experience. Every LEGO set even the hardest one to build, I like to build it. And the small sets, i'm kinda disappointed. Ok playability. So again technic lift arms to make a special function. But the top coming of like a plane, I think that's really cool. The cage i like too. So for the overall rating its a E like on a calculator it doesn't have enough space for more. So I'll say a 27 (adding all the other ratings together). Bye.

author: Darthdany
title: One of the best Ninjago sets!
review:
The Ultra Sonic Raider is one of the best Ninjago sets in my opinion. There's a lot of figures, including the exclusive-to-this-set Pythor, and ZX Ninjas, with armor and places to put their katanas on their back. and includes all 4 Golden Weapons, with an extra Nunchuck of Lightning and Sword of Fire. The vehicle itself has a great colour scheme, and the gold daggers make it look more fearsome. The best part of the set (in my opinion) is that the vehicle can separate into 2. The vehicle is pretty large, and the golden swords are too. Also, like most Ninjago sets this looks pretty much like the actual one in the cartoon series, minus the prison cage.

Pros

  • Includes the exclusive Pythor.
  • Very large vehicle can split into 2.
  • Has all 4 Golden Weapons, and a place to store them too.
  • Awesome colour scheme.
  • Golden Swords on jet/plane is humongous.
  • When the swords are in the jet locks on to the land vehicle, but when the swords are out it releases from the land vehicle.
  • Snake prison at the back of the vehicle.

Cons

  • The treads don't move on wood, have to use something that is not smooth.
  • The 2 cockpits can only sit 1 Ninja each, so the other two just have to sit out of the vehicle.
  • Lego should have made a attacking thing for the bad guys too, since the only bad stuff are the snakes. They're no match for the Ninjas in this set.

This set is awesome, a great addition to your Ninjago sets. Pretty much one of the biggest Ninjago Ninja's vehicles. 9/10.

author: brianashe
title: Looks great, but play gently
review: Others have given good reviews of this set, so I just wanted to point out one downside I haven't seen mentioned -- this set is pretty fragile in actual play. The following parts come off very easily in the hands of a typical 8-year-old: the engines and flames, the entire front cockpit, the lights, the tail, the tread-mounted weapons, and the little white "hubcaps", front and back. The assembly is rather intricate and spindly and the shape is such that it's not easy to get a good grip on it in many ways. If you like good-looking models, it's a great set; if you like playing with your builds, you'll spend a lot of time rebuilding this.

author: rinaldo
title: A spectacular rider with spaceship inside
review:
The set LEGO Ninjago 9449 Ultra Sonic Raider refers to the episode of the Ninjago series in which the Spinjitzu masters have identified Pythor the supreme leader and his protector Spitta, a soldier of the tribe of Venomari, intent to sneak away with the fang-sword Fangpyre .

The set 9449 is sold in a box of large size, and consists of:
 

  • Crawler supersonic
  • Four minifigs of Ninjago: Kai, Zane, Jay, Cole
  • Two minifigs: Pythor, Spitta|


and is aimed at an audience of at least 8 years old, but in this case I think we can safely say that even children an year younger with enough experience in LEGO bricks are able to safely assemble and play it.

The assembly begins, as usual, from the envelope number 1 without any difficulty starting with minifigs, after it passes to the assembly of the base of the rider. At this stage there you have to assemble the chassis of the rider, it is very long and wide to ensure proper rigidity, and for this reason is made with Lego Technic brick; therefore requires more attention and ability. It then goes to the envelope number 2 to assemble the cockpit of the base of the rider that does not present particular difficulties and allows you to easily finish and start with the envelope number 3, who allows you to assemble the mobile/rotating part of the track and the wheels.

At this point the base of the rider is completed and you start with the envelope number 4 to achieve the shuttle of the rider. That's the second phase that requires more attention because here there are integrated the mechanism for opening / closing the blades that allows the attachment/detachment to the rider and the small prison.

 

After completing the assembly I find it useful to report:

PRO
 

  • Very interesting and innovative design.
  • Coupling/release system of the shuttle.
  • Dual cockpit.
  • Prison.
  • 4 Minifig Ninjago

 

CONS

  • The part of the frame that holds the suspension tracked between the two tracks tends to form an arc due to the big length
  • The flames of the motors are unhook easily
  • The opening mechanism of the blades is not very easy to use


Conclusions
The set  9449 is  very interesting because it presents some solutions never seen before its presentation, such as the shape of the tracks, the tracks, the system that release the shuttle and the prison. It is a set that can not be missed in the collection of a Ninjago fan and provides the starting point for a variety of game scenarios. In addition, not underestimate the fact that with a single box, you will have four Ninjago minifig.


Overall Rating 
Very Good

 

Here on my blog you can find the complete review with all the photos:

http://brickreview.blogspot.it/2014/07/lego-9449-cingolato-supersonico.html

(it is available in Italian and English languages, moreover using the translate button

on the right side, is possible to translate the review using rh google translation in all the languages)

If you like this review, please leave me a comment here and/or on my blog

Thank you

author: LightningBricks
title: Not very accurate
review:
Pros

- Very cool minifigs, you get all 4 ninjas, Pythor, and spitta

- Cool rubberband system and treads

 

Cons

- Can only sit 2 ninja

- Pretty boring build

- Very high ppb (price per brick)

 

Overall, I rate this a 87/100. (math nerd right here)

 

If you want this set, buy it used. New is not worth it. It has some cool parts and playability AND minifigs, but it is inaccurate with the TV show, as it can only fit 2 figs. That is a very big problem, and it is fixed in the Ultra Stealth Raider. :P
